articles.description: Reaction to Thursday's Europa League and Conference League fixtures as Man Utd draw, Chelsea & Spurs win and Rangers lose.
articles.title: European reaction: Man Utd rescue dramatic draw, Spurs & Chelsea win, Rangers lose

articles.description: After a long-running dispute between ex-Chelsea and Arsenal midfielder Lassana Diarra and Fifa, a court has ruled against the governing body.
articles.title: Lassana Diarra: Fifa transfer rules break EU law - top court rules

articles.description: Erik ten Hag turned to Harry Maguire and Jonny Evans to rescue Manchester United at Porto - and the centre-back pair delivered.
articles.title: Porto 3-3 Man Utd: How Harry Maguire became United's unlikely super sub

articles.description: Kevin O'Connell, the Minnesota Vikings head coach, tells BBC Sport about how he helped his players deal with the death of team-mate Khyree Jackson and emerge as one of the NFL's only unbeaten teams.
articles.title: Kevin O'Connell interview: Minnesota Vikings head coach on Khyree Jackson, unbeaten record and NFL London game

articles.description: Iga Swiatek, the world number one, announces split with coach Tomasz Wiktorowski.
articles.title: Iga Swiatek splits with coach Tomasz Wiktorowski after three years

articles.description: South Africa face West Indies in the Women’s T20 World Cup at Dubai International Stadium, Dubai – follow text updates, radio commentary and video highlights.
articles.title: South Africa vs West Indies LIVE: Women’s T20 World Cup – cricket score, radio commentary, video highlights and text updates

articles.description: Erik ten Hag remains defiant after his side's dramatic draw at Porto but is the Manchester United boss still on the brink?
articles.title: Manchester United: Erik ten Hag still defiant but is the manager still on brink?

articles.description: Kirk Cousins throws a career-high 509 yards during the Atlanta Falcons' win against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
articles.title: Kirk Cousins guides Atlanta Falcons to 36-30 overtime win against Tampa Bay Buccaneers

articles.description: Manager Philippe Clement laments Rangers' profligacy in their heavy Europa League defeat to Lyon - but are there bigger issues?
articles.title: Rangers 1-4 Lyon: Philippe Clement laments profligacy - but are there bigger issues?

articles.description: Southampton and England goalkeeper Aaron Ramsdale says he left Arsenal because he did not "want to win trophies if I was sitting on the bench".
articles.title: Aaron Ramsdale: Southampton goalkeeper left Arsenal for more game time
